metadata.title: CVE-2017-12110 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists in the xls_appendSST function of libxls 1.4.A specially crafted XLS file can cause memory corruption resulting in remote code execution.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
